ultimate_goal: find a top rated keyboard on amazon.ca

subgoal_list.subgoal: task starts, go for the next sub-goal
Search for 'top rated keyboard' on amazon.ca to find the best options.
Enter 'keyboard' as the search term in the search input field and press enter key.
Click on the dropdown labeled 'Sort by:' to change sorting options.
Click on the option labeled 'Avg. customer review' in the sort dropdown menu.
